Class PollingConstants

    • org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api.transport.PollingConstants

    Since:

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CONCURRENT
      If this flag is false, only one transport thread of the ESB will "poll" for messages at any given time, This could be used to prevent concurrent downloads of the same files from a remote S/FTP server, etc.
      static java.lang.String CONCURRENT_EXECUTION
      Limit the concurrent execution of a polling transport based proxy service.

      • CONCURRENT

        public static final java.lang.String CONCURRENT
        If this flag is false, only one transport thread of the ESB will "poll" for messages at any given time, This could be used to prevent concurrent downloads of the same files from a remote S/FTP server, etc. However, some transports such as IMAP may allow concurrent polling under certain circumstances (default false)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONCURRENT_EXECUTION

        public static final java.lang.String CONCURRENT_EXECUTION
        Limit the concurrent execution of a polling transport based proxy service. Setting this to 1 limits the execution to a single threaded execution model. Defaults to MAX_INT (i.e. unlimited)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
